name: Sowjanya Vendra
professional_summary: Innovative and accomplished Assistant Professor with a proven track record in leveraging technology for curriculum delivery and student assessment. Strong scientific background with expertise in Chemical and Petroleum technology, keenly interested in applying skills to the Oil, Gas and Chemical industry. Passionate about analytical and problem-solving skills to optimise processes, reduce costs, and ensure environmental compliance. Dedicated to safer, efficient and sustainable industry practices.
